TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void CacheItemUpdateCallback(string key, CacheItemUpdateReason reason, out object expensiveObject, out CacheDependency dependency, out DateTime absoluteExpiration, out TimeSpan slidingExpiration);
.class public auto ansi sealed CacheItemUpdateCallback extends System.MulticastDelegate

Public Delegate Sub CacheItemUpdateCallback(key As String, reason As CacheItemUpdateReason, ByRef expensiveObject As Object, ByRef dependency As CacheDependency, ByRef absoluteExpiration As DateTime, ByRef slidingExpiration As TimeSpan)

public delegate void CacheItemUpdateCallback(System::String ^ key, CacheItemUpdateReason reason, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::Object ^ % expensiveObject, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] CacheDependency ^ % dependency, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] DateTime % absoluteExpiration, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] TimeSpan % slidingExpiration);
type CacheItemUpdateCallback = delegate of string * CacheItemUpdateReason * * * * -> unit

Docs.param: The identifier of the item that is being removed from the cache.
The reason that the item is being removed from the cache.
When this method returns, contains the cached item object that contains the updates.
When this method returns, contains the object that defines the dependency between the item object and a file, a cache key, an array of either, or another object.
When this method returns, contains the time at which the object expired.
When this method returns, contains the interval between the time that the object was last accessed and the time at which the object expired.
Docs.summary: Defines a callback method for notifying applications before a cached item is removed from the cache.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 當物件過期的快取中時，ASP.NET 會呼叫<xref:System.Web.Caching.CacheItemUpdateCallback>方法具有索引鍵的快取項目和原因可能會想要更新項目。 這個方法的其他參數是 out 參數。 您提供新的快取項目和選擇性的到期日和重新整理快取的項目時所要使用的相依性值。
如果明確移除快取的項目所使用的呼叫不會呼叫更新回呼<xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.Remove%2A>。
如果您想要從快取中移除的快取項目，您必須傳回`null`中`expensiveObject`參數。 否則，您新的快取資料的參考使用傳回`expensiveObject`參數。 如果您未指定到期或相依性的值，移除項目會從快取只在需要記憶體時。
如果回呼方法會擲回例外狀況，ASP.NET 會抑制例外狀況，並移除快取的值。
